content.value:
"Right," the doctor said, "what seems to be the issue?"
"Well... I used to have psychic powers."
"Oh?"
"I could re-heat my coffee, or move the cup to me if I put it down somewhere else. Now I can't."
"Would it require you to focus your mind?"
"Yes."
"Are you following the news?"
content.html: "Right," the doctor said, "what seems to be the issue?" "Well... I used to have psychic powers." "Oh?" "I could re-heat my coffee, or move the cup to me if I put it down somewhere else. Now I can't." "Would it require you to focus your mind?" "Yes." "Are you following the news?"
